enhanced_by.method_name: intersects(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: The intersects method checks if two rectangles intersect, which can be used to set up boundary conditions for distance calculations.

enhanced_by.method_name: distance(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods calculate distances between points, making the distance method a good candidate for asserting the correctness of distanceSquared.
The lineIntersects method also involves distance calculations and can be used to assert the behavior of distanceSquared in scenarios involving circles.
